name: Don't Give Up Puppo! puzzles- games
name_original: Don't Give Up Puppo! puzzles- games
description:
••• FREE FOR LIMITED TIME •••
••• DOnT GiVe iT uP •••

Puzzles are hard but it teaches you if you have troubles or problems in your life but don't give it up. Try to solve the puzzles and be strong.

If you don't solve the puzzle then come back again and i am sure you will solve it.

How to play:
• Remove the lines on the screen, if two lines intersect then it shows.
• If you disintersect the lines it will disappear.
